list_definition.definition: (of a price etc) not expensive, therefore able to compete successfully with the prices etc of rivals

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: We can offer extremely competitive prices to our customers.

list_definition.definition: (of sport etc) organised in such a way as to produce a winner

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I prefer hill climbing to competitive sports.
